Preterit.turoyo: tfəqle l-u=qaṭunobayn am=maye, ḥnīq u=zoġo 125; prs 166/33; u=zlāmḥniq, mayəṯ m-u=dexono
translations: ‘The man suffocated, died from the smoke’ 71/90;

Infectum.turoyo: omərgəm-məḥnəqina. ummo lo=zayʕət 130; prs 43/33;u=zlam-ayḏanlawġulfayəš u=dexonoʕabərrišewaxta d-məḥnəq
translations: ‘The man stayed inside. The smoke came at him, and at that very moment he began suffocating’ 76/22;

Infectum-wa.turoyo: ánnaqla an=nošayḏi, aš=šəšwonenəfqi-wa. kulḥa d-nofaq-wamičək-wabayn am=mayeməḥnəq-wa 132; 73/302;

Imperativ.turoyo: mḥaláqmanṯomə-d-sawkux l qḏolamofeq-a hat, i=manṯobə-qḏola, w ḥnaq-a 120; 57/111;

Part. Pass..turoyo: mawfaqqe u=qašo w u=abroḥniqe, mamṭan-ne l-u=bayto 133; prs 248/33;
